00015 #ifndef NINJA_CLEAN_H_
00016 #define NINJA_CLEAN_H_
00017 
00018 #include "build.h"
00019 
00020 #include <string>
00021 #include <set>
00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 struct State;
00025 struct BuildConfig;
00026 struct Node;
00027 struct Rule;
00028 struct DiskInterface;
00029 
00030 class Cleaner
00031 {
00032 public:
00033   /// Build a cleaner object with a real disk interface.
00034   Cleaner(State* state, const BuildConfig& config);
00035 
00036   /// Build a cleaner object with the given @a disk_interface
00037   /// (Useful for testing).
00038   Cleaner(State* state,
00039           const BuildConfig& config,
00040           DiskInterface* disk_interface);
00041 
00042   /// Clean the given @a target and all the file built for it.
00043   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00044   int CleanTarget(Node* target);
00045   /// Clean the given target @a target.
00046   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00047   int CleanTarget(const char* target);
00048   /// Clean the given target @a targets.
00049   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00050   int CleanTargets(int target_count, char* targets[]);
00051 
00052   /// Clean all built files.
00053   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00054   int CleanAll();
00055 
00056   /// Clean all the file built with the given rule @a rule.
00057   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00058   int CleanRule(const Rule* rule);
00059   /// Clean the file produced by the given @a rule.
00060   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00061   int CleanRule(const char* rule);
00062   /// Clean the file produced by the given @a rules.
00063   /// @return non-zero if an error occurs.
00064   int CleanRules(int rule_count, char* rules[]);
00065 
00066   /// @return the number of file cleaned.
00067   int cleaned_files_count() const {
00068     return cleaned_files_count_;
00069   }
00070 
00071   /// @return whether the cleaner is in verbose mode.
00072   bool IsVerbose() const {
00073     return (config_.verbosity != BuildConfig::QUIET
00074             && (config_.verbosity == BuildConfig::VERBOSE || config_.dry_run));
00075   }
00076 
00077 private:
00078   /// Remove the file @a path.
00079   /// @return whether the file has been removed.
00080   int RemoveFile(const string& path);
00081   /// @returns whether the file @a path exists.
00082   bool FileExists(const string& path);
00083   void Report(const string& path);
00084   /// Remove the given @a path file only if it has not been already removed.
00085   void Remove(const string& path);
00086   /// @return whether the given @a path has already been removed.
00087   bool IsAlreadyRemoved(const string& path);
00088   /// Helper recursive method for CleanTarget().
00089   void DoCleanTarget(Node* target);
00090   void PrintHeader();
00091   void PrintFooter();
00092   void DoCleanRule(const Rule* rule);
00093   void Reset();
00094 
00095 private:
00096   State* state_;
00097   BuildConfig config_;
00098   set<string> removed_;
00099   int cleaned_files_count_;
00100   DiskInterface* disk_interface_;
00101   int status_;
00102 };
00103 
00104 #endif  // NINJA_CLEAN_H_
